Articles.Content: When ever i put a wing on another wing, the game does not know what to do and just accelerates my planes to extremly high velocities (100 m/s+) before the craft implodes. Is this just me or is there something wrong with the wings?
Hi aweapingangel, can you please provide an affected craft file, and your KSP.log and player.log after one of these events occurs would be very useful as well.
